job description:
Under direction of the Director, Talent Acquisition or designee, perform root cause analysis and assist with maximizing talent decisions with data to drive higher levels of organizational development. Collaborate across business functions to link Talent Acquisition data to functional areas including sales, finance, etcMay provide functional or technical supervision over employees in same or closely related classification.Bachelors degree in business or related field, or equivalent combination of related knowledge and experience required. A high level of computer skills including knowledge of various software packages (i.e. Word, Excel, Access, Power Point, etc.) are required. One (1) to three (3) years of professional data analysis experience in health care and Human Resources or other related field is required. Adept at queries, report writing and presenting findings. Strong knowledge of and experience with HRIS and related reporting packages. Advanced Excel skills; adept at queries, report writing, and presenting findings.
